caption.center: DOMINICK DEANGELO, Appellant, v. STATE OF FLORIDA, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fifth District.

opinion.posture: 3.850 Appeal from the Circuit Court for Orange County, Julie H. O'Kane, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Dominick Deangelo, Polk City, Pro Se.
Bill McCollum, Attorney General, Tallahassee, and Bonnie Jean Parrish, Assistant Attorney General, Daytona Beach, for Appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED.
SAWAYA, ORFINGER and COHEN, JJ., concur.
NOT FINAL UNTIL THE TIME EXPIRES TO FILE REHEARING MOTION, AND, IF FILED, DISPOSED OF.Page 1
